unnormalised: Seriously, guys, are we still arguing about which state has the highest population? Last I checked in the 2011 census, UP was leading with something like 200 million ppl, but I bet Bihar is catching up fast! Maybe we should have a population race like the tortoise and the hare. My money's on Bihar hitting 25% growth rate next time – they're prepping the pitch, I tell ya! ;)
normalised: Seriously, guys, are we still arguing about which state has the highest population? Last I checked in the two thousand and eleven census, U-P was leading with something like two hundred million people, but I bet Bihar is catching up fast! Maybe we should have a population race like the tortoise and the hare. My money's on Bihar hitting twenty five percent growth rate next time – they're prepping the pitch, I tell ya!
